Texts.Chs: 在非法分发武器方面，猿人反抗军仅次于企鹅。
Texts.Eng: Apex rebels are second only to penguins in illegal weapons distributions.
Armed to the teeth ain't they?

Texts.Chs: 声名狼藉的军火商们有时是我们抵抗军成员可以接触到的。
Texts.Eng: Disreputable arms dealers are sometimes all us resistance members have access to.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人感觉就像一个进了糖果店的孩子！
Texts.Eng: Floran feels like a kid in a candy store!

Texts.Chs: 只有当他们的武装足够强大，毫无疑问，他们才能永远不再被雇佣……
Texts.Eng: Only when their arms are sufficient beyond doubt, can they never be employed again...

Texts.Chs: 军火商的柜台。他给你配备了武器。还有一些是以文字的形式出现的！
Texts.Eng: The counter of an arms dealer. He fits you with weapons. And some of them in the form of words!

Texts.Chs: 猿人反抗军表现出的破釜沉舟十分可怕。
Texts.Eng: The desperate ferocity Apex rebels display is rather frightening.

Texts.Chs: 这里有各种各样的武器，但大部分是炸药。
Texts.Eng: There's all kinds of weapons here, but its mostly explosives.
